head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BARKHORN, HENRY C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BARKHORN, HENRY C.

block.p: BARKHORN-Henry C. Of NYC and Easthampton NY. Died at home on July 27, 2000. Age 84 after a long illness. Beloved husband of Jean, loving father of Joan Hass, Henry and William. Grandfather of Norah and Claire Hass, Eleanor and Philip Barkhorn. Brother of Richard Barkhorn and Mariette Buchman and the late Janet. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81 Street, Sunday 7-9pm. Mass of Christian burial at St. Vincent Ferrer R.C. Church, Lexington Avenue at 66 Street, 10am Monday. Interment to follow at Cedar Lawn Cemetery, Easthampton, NY. Donations to The Alzheimer's Disease Assocation, NYC Chapter or Princeton University would be appreciated.
